title: newcasinobitcoin
author: newcasinobitcoin
content: Hi,my duelbits account is locked for withdrawal. i pay experimented player who pass 1000% KYC verification (after result).let me know your price (pm)thanks

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Will you sell your identity? It is very risky to do kyc on gambling sites here. there, who will kyc your account for you? Your account may be locked because you have transacted huge amount of money there without doing any kind of kyc.  Or you have engaged in any illegal activity there that violates their rulers. I don't know who can make you do this.  But it is not sure that you will find someone for it

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Instead of paying someone to pass on KYC, why you just can't do that on your own? You'll have more trouble if it's not yourself that will do the verification per se.And you're saying that this is just going to be an experiment? Which means if the first one that will take it fails, you'll get another one to try it again, is it like that?That casino will notice that you're doing and might totally lock that withdrawal and funds you've got there.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: newcasinobitcoin on October 06, 2023, 12:12:15 PMHi,my duelbits account is locked for withdrawal. i pay experimented player who pass 1000% KYC verification (after result).let me know your price (pm)thanksSorry, but are you looking for someone to complete KYC procedures instead of you? Can you explain the reasons that prevent you from doing it yourself? I think that the only reason is that you have an account with your identity, and you want to verify an alternative account, and it is most likely that this is the reason for which your withdrawals are frozen. This is inevitably forbidden according to the conditions of use on the site and therefore you want to manipulate the system.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP if you pay for someone to pass KYC for you from this platform will your account login IP read the same as the persons own login IP? Even if the person uses VPN to login that would make it worse because your account is accustomed to one particular login IP and therefore, you will be called to answer some question. If I am not mistaken, from the looks you seems to sound like someone already using VPN to login and maybe you are from a restricted place and not allowed to play with the casino. I hope you know the consequences of what you are doing and you are ready to take in fate anything that comes up as a result of your actions. Do not come complaining that Duelbits scammed you of your funds when what you have planned backfires.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: sunsilk on October 06, 2023, 12:44:38 PMInstead of paying someone to pass on KYC, why you just can't do that on your own? You'll have more trouble if it's not yourself that will do the verification per se.It’s either he came from restricted country or he is doing shady transactions such as money laundering on his account that’s why he can’t do his own KYC verification because there’s no sense to hire and pay someone that he can do alone without any problem.@OP, I’m not sure what you are trying to pullout here but completing KYC verification on different device and IP will sure raise an alarm to the casino since it’s different from the original data which you use when you register and play. Can you explain what’s this kind of experimented thing because this is new to me.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Looks like you are trying to do something illegal and this is why you won't use KYC documents but would rather look for someone else to risk using his/hers.I would advise anyone thinking of entering a deal with OP to desist from doing so, as it may land them into trouble. The funds in the account could have been obtained fraudulently or laundered.These are the kind of services that should be completely banned in the forum as then only encourage illegal activities and fraud.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Don't get angry @newcasinobitcoin with me. But it's better to clarify that in this case there is a serious risk for anyone carrying out such an operation.this account may have been linked to illegal activities (fraudulent use of cards, rigged matches etc etc...) KYC user could get involved in situations that... you could certainly do without....obviously everyone is free to do what they want (even playing blindfolded on the highway) but I would still be very careful no one gives anything away for free....

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: Quote from: newcasinobitcoin on October 06, 2023, 12:12:15 PMHi,my duelbits account is locked for withdrawal. i pay experimented player who pass 1000% KYC verification (after result).let me know your price (pm)thanksYour account is more likely to get fully blocked if you keep trying to scam the gambling site by submitting false information. This also poses quite a risk for those who might be tempted by such offers. They have no clue about the transactions going on behind the scenes, like where the funds are coming from. Who knows, it might even be linked to some illegal activities, you know?

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on October 06, 2023, 02:06:19 PMQuote from: sunsilk on October 06, 2023, 12:44:38 PMInstead of paying someone to pass on KYC, why you just can't do that on your own? You'll have more trouble if it's not yourself that will do the verification per se.It’s either he came from restricted country or he is doing shady transactions such as money laundering on his account that’s why he can’t do his own KYC verification because there’s no sense to hire and pay someone that he can do alone without any problem.@OP, I’m not sure what you are trying to pullout here but completing KYC verification on different device and IP will sure raise an alarm to the casino since it’s different from the original data which you use when you register and play. Can you explain what’s this kind of experimented thing because this is new to me.Let's wait for him to answer but it's better for those that are in restricted area, better to ask the casino first if they're going to allow that through email or simply contact support.Because with these type of concerns, it's most likely that there's a shady activity that's probably being done although that's just an speculation and we'll never know it actually unless OP answer's it honestly.If there's someone that would like to do it for him, at least we've tried to say what we wanna say.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: newcasinobitcoin on October 06, 2023, 12:12:15 PMHi,my duelbits account is locked for withdrawal. i pay experimented player who pass 1000% KYC verification (after result).let me know your price (pm)thanksWhat exactly are you trying to accomplish here ? You account is locked and you want that someelse do the KYC verification on your account so that you enable the withdraw ? Why would anyone do that, even for money ? We never know where did you bring in the funds, whether you deposited black money or something and anyone who will do KYC become responsible for your bad intentions.I guess no one here will be that greedy to risk his identity for few bucks (by the way you did not mention how much you are willing to pay for this).
